text: The 1949 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 16th edition of the women's singles championship. Gizi Farkas defeated Květa Hrušková in the final by three sets to one, to win claim a third consecutive title. ==Results== \+ Time limit rule applied ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1949 in women's table tennis
title: 1949 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
